issues.description: The copy_exception function accesses exc.tried and exc.chain without checking if they exist, potentially causing AttributeError
Token.split_contents() could enter an infinite loop or raise StopIteration if a template has a malformed translation marker
args_check static method doesn't have 'self' as first parameter but uses 'name' which isn't passed in the function signature
Type checking with isinstance(cached, type) and issubclass could lead to errors if cached is None
In Context.update(), other_dict.dicts[1:].pop() will fail if other_dict is a BaseContext with only one dictionary
CycleNode.render() doesn't handle empty cycle iterators, potentially causing StopIteration exception
